description:
Hanamori Shun, as he appears 16 years older due to time spent in a different, isolated fragment of space, where time progresses at an accelerated rate.
He took care of http://anidb.net/ch90595 [Shindou Yukika] and raised her to help parents, http://anidb.net/ch87281 [Shindou Koujirou] and http://anidb.net/ch87274 [Tsukai Saraka] defeat http://anidb.net/ch87269 [Yaha-kui Zashunina].
name: Hanamori Shun
